name: Han Wang
about: A fellow Canadian once said that "sometimes it's the journey that teaches you a lot about your destination". Being a part of DTI is about making a difference while learning how to do so. Outside of the project team, I fiddle around with MEAN stack development and entrepreneurship. If you ever need me, you can find me programming in a corner at your nearest hackathon.

name: Kathleen Xu
about: I'm a junior double majoring in Information Science and Applied Economics and Management. I'm happiest when I'm creating, whether that be writing a story, knitting a scarf or drawing. I'm currently a part of DTI (obviously), Shogi Club, and the Cornell Lunatic. When I'm not trying to power through all my work, you can find me drinking boba tea, watching anime, or obsessing over my betta fish.

name: Megan She
about: I'm a senior English major, but I identify as the ampersand in Arts & Sciences. I love working an espresso bar, making far too many Spotify playlists, and dabbling in the sublime. I'm also a member of Cornell Mars Rover and Science Olympiad at Cornell. I'm always looking for more niche academia, another stamp in my passport, and the best brie out there. And I'm always a sucker for bad jokes.

name: Rebecca Fu
about: I am currently a junior studying applied economics and management with a concentration in business analytics! DTI stood out to me because it gave me an opportunity to explore my interests in tech outside of class and meet a great community of people who were passionate about helping others. But outside of academics, I love to dance, play tennis, and browse the sales section at Urban. And you can probably catch me at eHub in the AMs dancing wildly to my throwback playlist.

name: Isabella Yuchang Zhou
about: I enjoy creation, especially the process of realizing one crazy idea. As both software engineer and designer I am actively involved in projects that develop cool products -- mobile apps, web apps, online game, etc. I have been a freelance illustrator since my entry to college and have recently collaborated with my favorite pop singer's concert team! I also design for Cornell Chinese Drama Society, Association of Computer Science Undergraduates, Cornell University Sustainable Design and some school magazines.

name: Laura Sizemore
about: I am a junior studying Computer Science in the College of Engineering. I enjoy using technology to cause a positive impact in my community and beyond. In addition to technical project management, I have experience in full-stack development and data analysis. When I'm not coding, I enjoy reading sci-fi novels, playing board games, and spending time with friends.

name: Boon Palipatana
about: I'm an Information Science Major concentrating in Data Science. I love working with data analytics in addition to web, mobile app, and game development. Outside of class, I spend time watching basketball, running at a reasonable pace, being an RA in the Low Rises, and bonding with the squirrels on campus.

name: Emily Chan
about: Hello! I'm Emily and I'm a product designer, nature lover, and meme enthusiast. When I'm not hanging out in Duffield or designing something with too many gradients, catch me rock climbing, hiking, cooking, playing guitar, or looking at cute otters on Instagram. I'm also passionate about using tech for social good! Here's a shameless plug for some of my favorite orgs I've worked with:  https://risefirst.org/, https://cariclub.com/, https://hack4impact.org/.

name: Adam Masters
about: I am a senior College Scholar with a double major in Information Science. My college scholar project is focused on assessing the ethical and social implications of advancing AI. I spent this past summer at Facebook as a Product Data Operations Specialist helping to price the overall product improvement of Facebook Portal. I also currently work for Assist, the leading chatbot provider for messaging and voice. On campus, I am a member of Suna Breakfast and Mundial FC. Outside of school I love photography and listening to music.

name: Bryan Graeser
about: When I'm not in Duffield working on a CS pset or DTI, I enjoy working on creative writing pieces and going to the gym. I am also Co-Director of Hack4Impact, a nonprofit, social impact CS group on campus. In my free time, I like playing games with friends and showing people unsolicited pet photos.

name: Dray Farley
about: I love working on software that solves real problems, whether it be on campus, in the fitness industry, or in social impact. I primarily work on back-end but love to explore new frameworks and tech stacks! Outside of tech, I am an RA on north campus and a huge (unfortunately) New York Knicks fan. I also enjoy reading and going to the gym in my free time.

name: Erin Chen
about: I'm a senior in Arts & Sciences studying Information Science. I'm most passionate about the intersection of design, art, and storytelling. While design and technology has been my focus, I'm curious about the ways that good design can improve any field or industry. Talk to me about all sorts of design, cooking, plants, or music.

name: Flora Liu
about: Hi, I'm Flora! I am currently studying Information Science in CAS, with concentrations in UI/UX and Digital Culture and Production. In my free time you can find me binging Tasty videos, drinking boba (30% sugar light ice ofc), or traveling (I've been to every single Disney in the world!).

name: Jessica Chen
about: I love exploring/developing ways that technology can contribute to community impact. Aside from CDTI, I am also the philanthropy chair for Alpha Omega Epsilon (Cornell's engineering sorority), a member of the club tennis team, an AEW facilitator, and a Cornell Engineering Ambassador! In my free time, I enjoy hiking, hammocking, adventuring, eating, and chasing sunsets.

name: Julian Londono
about: Productivity is a lifestyle: when I'm not working with my team on CU Reviews you'll find me working on Info Sci research, exploring curiosity-driven side projects, mountain biking, or playing soccer or frisbee. I'm always trying to expand my technical knowledge and skill sets as well as explore more of the world whenever possible.  Fun fact: I took a road-trip from New Jersey to California and back this past summer and it was a blast!

name: Yvonne Chan
about: I love working with people. DTI allows me to do this while also solving greater community problems. I also get to do what I love when I am nature walking, creative writing, and exploring new music with others. Apart from DTI, I am a member of the Assorted Aces Dance Team and the WICC Photo Committee. When I'm not working in Upson Hall, I'm finding the best study spots on campus or rediscovering my love for Brooklyn Nine-Nine!

name: Aram Chouldjian Baghdassarian
about: Gosh, I feel like these always come off as so generic and cliche and have always wondered what I can do to make them seem less trite. Do people even read these? I'm genuinely curious, so if you're reading this then click here! When you click on the link, you'll find instructions to see how many people also clicked the link!

name: Ashrita Raman
about: Hi, I'm Ashrita! I am a junior majoring in computer science and minoring in music and linguistics. I am passionate about using technology to create a positive social impact. At Cornell, I teach piano to undergraduates through the Cornell Piano Society and am also a member of the Cornell Symphony Orchestra and Cornell Hack4Impact. Outside of class, you can find me listening to 19th century Romantic music, reading Harry Potter, going on a run, or taking pictures of good food.

name: Jagger Brulato
about: I'm a junior majoring in Computer Science. I like writing and producing funk fusion music, and I do a lot of board/watersports. I also play a lot of chess and Tetris.

name: Lisa LaBarbera
about: I am a junior majoring in Information Science with a minor in Law and Society. I am from the small town by NYC. On campus, I am an Arts and Sciences Peer Advisor, a teaching assistant, and a member of APO and WICC. Last summer, I worked as a software development intern for Fiserv. My interests include photography, traveling and design, and in my free time she loves to explore, play music, and take pictures!

name: Qichen Hu
about: Hi! I'm Ethan. I'm a computer science major, and am especially interested in iOS dev. I believe in the developer's motto: Talk is cheap, show me the code!

name: Roddy Taipe
about: I consider myself an aspiring web developer since I am still constantly learning about the web development, but I am also interested in other areas of CS including embedded systems and data science. I am currently working for Cosmoptera, a startup based in Ithaca trying to disrupt the precision viticulture market.

name: Shane Yun
about: hi! I'm a product designer for CUE. I am comfortable with both mobile and iOS design. I am super excited to work on developing CUE!

name: Shi Chong Zhao
about: Hi I am Shi Chong, a sophomore majoring in CS. I'm from Singapore where the season's always summer (opposite of Ithaca). Apart from being a member of DTI,  I am also a pipa player in the Cornell Eastern Music Ensemble. Hit me up!

name: Stacy Wei
about: Hi! I am currently a junior studying CS. On campus, I am Engineering Peer Advisor and involved with Assorted Aces Dance Team, SWE, and CSA. Outside of class, I am either jamming to music, exploring Ithaca, or learning how to cook.

name: Andrew Gao
about: I'm a sophomore in the College of Arts & Sciences majoring in CS and Stats. I'm currently most experienced in Android and web/full-stack, but I'm always trying to explore and learn more. In my free time, I enjoy photography (hmu for headshots), graphic design, basketball, volleyball, and learning new things.

name: April Ye
about: When I'm not at Zeus or Starbucks, you can find me either meticulously brewing coffee or stir-frying the same noodle recipe for a year and counting. I love indulging in dating shows or haul videos while eating noodles, and have recently discovered a passion for making green smoothies!

name: Ashneel Das
about: I'm a second year student in the college of engineering studying computer science and math. I love to code, teach, and drink bubble tea! On campus I'm a member of Science Olympiad and DTI (of course). In my free time, I like to play cards, eat food, and watch Netflix.

name: Kaitlyn Son
about: NY based designer with a passion for all things creative, learning, and corgis. At any given party find me by the guac.

name: Kaushik Ravikumar
about: I'm an avid developer who loves seeing software used to solve problems. I'm also intrigued by the idea of Smart Cities and using the internet of things to improve our current infrastructures. I've previously worked at BuzzFeed and PubNub as a SWE. Besides that I love exploring nature, doing pretty much anything spontaneous, traveling, listening to music and dropping my own fire mixtapes on Souncloud.

name: Cedric Castillo
about: Hey, I'm Cedric and I'm a senior information science major. I joined DTI as a designer on cue, our events app, sophomore year. Fast forward to the end of junior year, I was given the privilege of joining the leads team to head our design initiatives. Over the past two summers, I've spent my time at a startup designing for growth at Concord, a contract success platform, and understanding how marketing teams utilize data visualizations as part of Facebook's connectivity branch. Outside of school and design, Cedric's currently working to hop on a new fashion wave and trying to learn more about coffee!

name: David Chu
about: In senior year, I have finally found my purpose at Cornell: to research distributed systems (with Alvisi!!!), to perform piano (recital on 11/24), to make friends, to teach, and to make memes. Sidenote: give Beethoven's Appassionata a listen if you want to spice up your life.

name: Evan Welsh
about: I'm a junior in the College of Arts and Sciences majoring in Computer Science. In my free time I love exploring all sorts of wild technologies. My adventures in Vue.js in fact led to this very site to use it. I've worked within frontend web, backend, and mobile spheres and enjoy periodically switching things up to get a better sense of new and especially emerging platforms. Outside of DTI I enjoy singing in Cornell Chorale, studying Latin, and experimenting with gluten-free recipes among other things.

name: Neha Rao
about: I love to stay busy on campus! Other than being a part of this amazing project team, I'm Co-President of Cornell's Original Musical Theatre Troupe, Anything Goes. In my free time, I enjoy singing, playing guitar, going to Zumba classes, watching Netflix, and eating ice cream!

name: Ashley Ticzon
about: When I’m not hiking up the slope to get to class, I enjoy singing and playing music. Also, I have a crazy good memory and can remember almost everything down to the smallest detail. And even though I grew up very accustomed to the warm California sunshine, I actually find the winters in Ithaca very enjoyable.

name: Bobby Villaluz
about: Hey! I am a junior studying computer science. I'm passionate about cybersecurity and developing software for positive community impact. When I'm not in the stacks, I love to surf, read, hike and play ping pong.

name: Trey Burrell
about: Hey!  I'm Trey and when my software developer hat is off, I'm either an entrepreneur, music producer, or gamer.  I currently serve on the Executive Board for BET, LINK, and SWAG.  You can either catch me in the Engineering Quad doing work, the DPE Office greeting visitors, or the eHub working on one of my businesses.  Thanks for reading!

name: Ryan Slama
about: I’m a Computer Science Senior at Cornell and 2019 Kleiner Perkins Engineering Fellow. The last two summers, I've worked on Slack’s Product Security team. I’m interested in weird music, modern board games, interesting podcasts, and oxford commas.

name: Sophia Wang
about: Hi, I'm Sophia! I am currently a senior and the PM for Queue Me In. Outside of school I love hiking, painting, music festivals and Thai food. I am obsessed with my Cockapoo and even made him an Instagram. Feel free to contact me at sw847@cornell.edu if you want to chat!

name: Vanessa Wang
about: Hi! I'm a junior studying computer science and minoring in electrical and computer engineering. Being on DTI has shown me how much of a positive impact I can make on the community using technology. Around campus, I devote my free time to volunteering with Alpha Phi Omega and helping out the Cornell Origami Club. You can also find me practicing my photography skills or crocheting away at home.

name: Aiden Yeonsuk Kim
about:
I'm a Product Designer currently studying Information Science at Cornell University. I became more involved in design after taking a course at Cornell called "Designing Technology for Social Impact."

I love solving problems, coming up with awesome solutions, then sometimes discovering I was wrong, and going back to the beginning to solve the issue from a new perspective. 

To me, design is like a game. A game which we can play with forever! A solution to a (design) problem will only be temporary, it will have to be solved again from a new point of view. Allowing us to play with it forever. I aim to learn from a diverse group of people, changers, influencers who love tackling challenges, share how to love others, and stay in bed with my dogs for as long as they allow me to.

name: Ayesha
about: Hey! I am a CS major that loves the beach, calligraphy, and boba.  I'm into adventurous things that don't involve scratches or bugs. Also, catch me at Olin and Uris as a librarian to get to know me better.

name: Connie Lei
about: I am a sophomore majoring in computer science and minoring in psychology. I am a front-end developer on the Research Connect team. I love being able to understand where, why and how bugs happen. One of my passions is helping programs like GWC or KWK and having a hand in helping the next generation of girls in computer science!

name: Nina Xie
about: Aspiring to solve real-world problems using technology, I’m growing to become a product driver. I’m passionate about interdisciplinary topics that combine tech, business, psych, and more. Besides a PM, I’m also a foodie, runner, music enthusiast, movie addict, and roller coaster lover.

name: Yisu Zheng
about: New to the design world, wish to explore more possibilities of design! Also hit me up for the best photo spots on campus <3

name: Matthew Epstein
about: I am a Junior studying Computer Science and pursuing a minor in Business from the Dyson School of Business. I enjoy consumerism, YouTube, buying new electronics, and lists of three or more items. When I am not pretending to study or attempting to finish my homework, you can find me in my bed, at Cafe Jennie, or at Target. I am currently watching way too much food videos on YouTube, and I am searching for a new area of video entertainment to explore. If you see me on campus, please say hello! I love meeting new people (but need improvement on my name recall)!

name: Megan Yin
about: I began coding when I was 13 years old and since then I have developed my skills through computational biology research, robotics, project teams, and free-lance web development. Through these experiences, I’ve developed an interest in robotics, machine learning, venture capital, front-end development and financial modeling. In addition, I’ve discovered the best code is written together and I love spending weekends planning and hosting collegiate hackathons with BigRed//Hacks or working with my team Cornell Design & Tech Initiative on campus.

name: Michael Xing
about: Michael is a full stack developer who enjoys building things for people to use. He primarily works in Java and web technologies, but dabbles with anything and everything that looks remotely interesting. When not coding, he enjoys helping aspiring developers while TA'ing 2110 / 2112, playing the piano, or playing video games (not necessarily in that order).

name: Michelle Park
about:
Hello! My name is Michelle Park and I believe there is power in digital experiences that are designed for humans, by a human.
I was born in South Korea, spent my childhood in both Hanoi and Ho Chi Minh City of Vietnam, and then grew up in Irvine, California. I believe that my experiences in growing up in different environments shaped me into the empathetic and fast-adapting person I am today. 
This past summer I ate lots of cake, explored new places by myself, sipped iced lattes, read books at a dog park, and went vintage store-hopping.

name: Sam Zhou
about: I am a full stack web developer with extensive experience in backend development in Kotlin/Java/NodeJS and frontend development with React/Angular Framework. Sam is interested in designing and developing extensible and scalable software systems as well as programming languages.

name: Vivian Shiu
about: I'm ABC: American-Brazilian-Chinese and a designer. I'm passionate about the unaware effects design can have on a person's life. Outside of school you can find me drinking an açai smoothie or petting dogs around campus. I love to play soccer, piano, doodle, and nap!

name: Ishika Jain
about: I am currently a sophomore majoring in computer science and economics in the College of Arts and Sciences. In my free time, you can find me performing as part of Cornell’s Indian Classical Dance group, Cornell Nazaqat, cooking or watching one of the many TV shows on ABC. I am excited to explore the design and development side of applications. I am always Down to Integrate (DTI) design and development to create applications that help to add to the Big Red experience!

name: Michael Huang
about: Designer, storyteller, and creative with a passion for purpose-driven products and ventures. Talk to me about digital product design, cooking, or corgis. Prev @ Google, IBM, Fair Trade USA.

name: Sanjana Seshadri
about: I'm an aspiring product designer and I hope to make a positive, social impact through the field of design. Besides designing, I love all things music and dance! On campus, I am a member of Cornell Anjali, an Indian classical dance team, and a member of Forté Campus at Cornell, a professional business organization. In my free time, I enjoy exploring new places to eat and drink coffee, finding fun things to take pictures of, and learning how to play my favorite songs on the piano.

name: Will Spencer
about: Hey! I'm Will, a sophomore developer on DTI, and I love to spend my time coding and helping out the community. Besides DTI, I am involved with Girls Who Code on campus, where I help high-school students learn and appreciate the basics of programming. Besides developing, I spend my time gaming and following politics, so I can commonly be found yelling at my computer due to a broken controller or some scandalous news story.

name: Sam Steinberg
about: I’m a junior studying Information Science with a concentration in User Experience. I’m a maker at heart, and have always been fascinated with the intersection of design, technology, and business. When I’m not in Duffield doing homework, you can find me hanging out with friends at the gorges, watching sy-fy movies, performing stand-up comedy at open mics, and eating acai bowls at Chatty Cathy.

name: Dhruv Baijal
about: I love working with people to produce creative solutions to important problems. Outside of work, I love sports and music!
